Text:
[V] Into your hands, LORD, I entrust my spirit.
[R] Into your hands, LORD, [*] I entrust my spirit.
[V] For you have redeemed us, LORD, God of truth.
Changes: 2023-08-14 - Paul Prins: Updated the versicles to match our Psalm 31:5.
2022-08-05 - Paul Prins: Update response to more closely follow the latin.
